name: AI News Aggregator Webhook
description: Webhook configuration for UnpackAI news aggregation

workflow.name: AI News Collection Workflow
workflow.description: Automated workflow to collect and process AI news from multiple sources

setup: 1. Import this configuration into your N8n instance
2. Update the webhook URL to match your deployed UnpackAI domain
3. Configure additional RSS feeds or news sources as needed
5. Test the workflow manually before enabling the schedule
6. Monitor the webhook endpoint for incoming data
customization: Add more RSS feeds from AI news sources
Implement content filtering and categorization logic
Add sentiment analysis for news articles
Set up notifications for breaking AI news
Add article summarization using AI services
